summary: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific and fall in love while growing up together.
cast: Jean Simmons|Donald Houston|Susan Stranks|Peter Rudolph Jones|Noel Purcell|James Hayter|Cyril Cusack|Maurice Denham|Philip Stainton|Patrick Barr|Nora Nicholson|Lyn Evans|Russell Waters|Stuart Lindsell|Dorothy Batley|Gladys Boot|John Boxer|Bill Raymond
title: La isla perdida
